overview_i18n.card1Content_i18n: Through our new keyboard, we aim to make it possible to easily communicate maths over all the popular messaging apps, while still providing a product which is comfortable for every day use.
overview_i18n.card2Content_i18n: Check out the friendly faces of the people working on the project.
overview_i18n.card3Content_i18n: Since this is a University based project, we know we need to finish by Friday 16th April 2021.
overview_i18n.card4Content_i18n: We really want to know what feedback people have for your project. View other people's thoughts and share your own by creating an account.
overview_i18n.sideTextP1_i18n: For our first-year project at the University of Manchester, we've been working to create a mathematical keyboard.
overview_i18n.sideTextP2_i18n: We started out with very little if any knowledge of Android or Kotlin, with some members having no coding experience prior to this year.
overview_i18n.sideTextP3_i18n: Over time we've learned a lot and made lots of progress. We've tried to keep track of what we've done over time so you can follow along.
